attributes.action: stop the erosion of academic freedom, WRT IT, in UK  universities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Academics should be free to use the open source software 'Linux' on their desktops and University's IT infrastructure policies should not be tied down to Microsoft's or Apple's operating systems only. Nor should existing Linux users be treated as second class citizens.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual universities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
